author: Julia Brown
contents:
Welcome to my website, I’m so happy you’ve stopped by to visit.
As this website is fresh, and I am not yet sure where I plan to take it, I will begin it all by introducting myself. I am a research scientist at Bigelow Laboratory for Ocean Sciences in Maine, USA and a mother of two little girls, regretably trying to do it all. My background is in microbiology and environmental virology, focusing primarily on marine phages.
title: Hello world
